I can access "http://www.archive.org" in my browser with no proplems (Firef=
ox 3.0.14) and don't have any other issues with the regular internet access=
.

Im running on Vista Home Premium Service Pack 2.

I'm trying it with the=
 standard profile with the minimum changes so that shouldn't be the issue..=
..

Like I said I have a router at my apartment which splits up to signal f=
or two computers...can that maybe play a role in it?!

Georgie

ive.org) and suddenly my crawl stalls right at the start?!?

> >> Which W=
indows?
> >>
> >> While Heritrix works on Windows -- indeed my primary deve=
lopment machine 
> >> is WindowsXP -- our primary target platform is Linux.=
 So it's possible 
> >> some things will be flaky in a Windows environment,=
 especially if using 
> >> something we haven't ever tested (like Vista/Win=
7, running the crawl 
> >> from/to Windows network volumes, running at odd =
installation paths, etc.).
> >>
> >> I would expect any such problems to ge=
nerate noticeable errors in the

hough.
